jobDescription: Must Have Skills: · Assist in the analysis & design, maintenance and development of the various technical components of the Bigdata based solutions· Complex Scala Spark programming, testing and debugging related to the framework used.· Understand the requirements from BSA and grooming session for the sprint.· Review and revise technical designs to meet project requirements· Minimum 5 years strong hands on experience on Scala and Spark.· Plan and design integration of various applications and their function.· Assist with problem solving from a Bigdata perspective· Scala, Spark, Hive, SQL· Experience with NifiNice to Have Skills: · Agile Development methodologySoft Skills: · Customer Insight· Teamwork & Cooperation· Analytical ThinkingEducation & Certifications: · University level Bachelor’s degree in a technical area of study (computer science, mathematics, engineering, etc.) or other BS/BA degree with a concentration in computer science or information systems.Job Type: ContractSalary: $50.00-$55.00 per hourSchedule:Monday to FridayExperience:Nifi: 2 years (Preferred)scala: 4 years (Preferred)Spark: 4 years (Preferred)DB2: 4 years (Preferred)Hadoop: 4 years (Preferred)Work remotely:No
